River Runner

A lightweight tool for reporting river conditions in the field.

Usage Guide Observation Types Design Notes Launch Survey

How to Use River Runner

← Back to Home

Quick Start

  1. Open the survey: River Runner Survey123 Web App
  2. Select the Observation Type that best matches what you see.
  3. Take a photo of the observation if possible.
  4. Answer the follow-up questions based on what you observed (these vary by type).
  5. Mark your location using the map tool.
  6. Submit your report. That’s it!

Observation Types

Each observation falls into one of the following categories:

  • Wildlife Observations
  • Plant Observations
  • Altered Agricultural Practice
  • Riverbank Erosion
  • Log Jams or Blockages
  • Unusual Water Conditions
  • Trash or Dumping
  • Other

Troubleshooting

If you have trouble submitting:

  • Ensure location services are enabled in your browser or mobile settings.
  • Try refreshing the page or switching to a different browser.
  • If problems persist, please contact your project lead or site coordinator.
